page.title: 01CHADDESDEN
page.content: {Chaddesden}lies to the north east of the{City of Derby,}but within the city boundaries. It is bounded to the south and west by the flood plain of the{River Derwent. On the north and eastern sides are found various villages forming the outskirts of Derby, before merging with those villages forming the outskirts of the City of Nottingham. It's mostly an area of{housing estates each with its schools, shopping complexes and recreation areas in the form of grassy spaces. There is a new{industrial estate}where this block meets the city centre, as well as a{park}which provides recreational facilities for the population on this side of Derby. The land rises sharply to the northern edge of this block and a view across the area is one of rooftops and roads.
